content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":149581,"originalJapaneseLine":"シーラの目尻にじわりと涙が浮かぶ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Tears welled up at the corner of Sheila's eyes."},{"lineNumber":149582,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……ありがとうございます。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Thank you very much."},{"lineNumber":149583,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いつもヒューバートさんにはとても感謝を……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I am always very grateful to Hubert-san...\""},{"lineNumber":149584,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どけっ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Get out of the way!\""},{"lineNumber":149585,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスキーック。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance-kick."},{"lineNumber":149586,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ら、ランス様！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"R-Rance-sama!?\""},{"lineNumber":149587,"originalJapaneseLine":"「俺様のものに馴れ馴れしく触るな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Don't touch what's mine so familiarly.\""},{"lineNumber":149588,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……お、お前なぁ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Y-You!\""},{"lineNumber":149589,"originalJapaneseLine":"「シィル、シーラ、お前らはここ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Sil, Sheila, you two stay here.\""},{"lineNumber":149590,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh...?\""},{"lineNumber":149591,"originalJapaneseLine":"「わわっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wah...\""},{"lineNumber":149592,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスは普段、大統領が腰を下ろす席に座ると、","translatedEnglishLine":"When Rance sat down in the seat where the president usually sits,"},{"lineNumber":149593,"originalJapaneseLine":"膝の上にシィルとシーラの二人を座らせた。","translatedEnglishLine":"he made Sil and Sheila sit on his lap."},{"lineNumber":149594,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よし、まあこんなもんだろう」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Alright, this should do.\""},{"lineNumber":149595,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ったく、すっかり元に戻りやがって。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Geez, you've completely gone back to normal."},{"lineNumber":149596,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ちったぁ凹んでる方がマシだったかもな」","translatedEnglishLine":"Maybe it was better when you were a bit down.\""},{"lineNumber":149597,"originalJapaneseLine":"「？　なんか言ったか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"? Did you say something?\""},{"lineNumber":149598,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いーえ、なにも言っておりませんで。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"N-no, I didn't say anything."},{"lineNumber":149599,"originalJapaneseLine":"　総統閣下様」","translatedEnglishLine":"Supreme Commander.\""},{"lineNumber":149600,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よく分からんがニヤつくな、気持ち悪い」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I don't really get it, but stop smirking, it's creepy.\""},{"lineNumber":149601,"originalJapaneseLine":"「へへっ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hehe.\""},{"lineNumber":149602,"originalJapaneseLine":"「シーラ様の帰還で喜ばれるのはいいですが……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's good that you're happy with Sheila-sama's return, but...\""},{"lineNumber":149603,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうですな、未だ魔人を倒す術はなく、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That's true. We still have no way to defeat the Demon God,"},{"lineNumber":149604,"originalJapaneseLine":"　状況は悪いままです」","translatedEnglishLine":"the situation remains dire.\""},{"lineNumber":149605,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がははははははは！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahahahahahaha!"},{"lineNumber":149606,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ばーかーどーもーめー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"You fools!\""},{"lineNumber":149607,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ？　お前も真面目に……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh? You think seriously too...\""},{"lineNumber":149608,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いや、その顔……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, that expression..."},{"lineNumber":149609,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お前まさか何か考えが？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Are you possibly thinking of something?\""},{"lineNumber":149610,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そのとおーーーーり！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Exactly!\""},{"lineNumber":149611,"originalJapaneseLine":"「前から臭いとは思っていたが……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I suspected it for a while... but now that the two have returned,"},{"lineNumber":149612,"originalJapaneseLine":"　二人が帰ってきたので確信が持てた」","translatedEnglishLine":"I am certain.\""},{"lineNumber":149613,"originalJapaneseLine":"「確信？　なにがだ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Certain? Certain about what?\""},{"lineNumber":149614,"originalJapaneseLine":"「奴の弱点だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"His weakness.\""},{"lineNumber":149615,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そんなものがあるのか！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"He has a weakness!?\""},{"lineNumber":149616,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がははははははははははは！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahahahahahahahaha!"},{"lineNumber":149617,"originalJapaneseLine":"　もう俺様の勝ちは決まったようなものだ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"My victory is practically assured!\""},{"lineNumber":149618,"originalJapaneseLine":"「が、その為には必要なものがある！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But for that, I need something!\""},{"lineNumber":149619,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おお、何か必要ならヘルマンがいくらでも","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, if you need anything, Hellman will cooperate as much as you want!\""},{"lineNumber":149620,"originalJapaneseLine":"　協力させてもらうぜ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'll help you!\""},{"lineNumber":149621,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それはなんだ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What is it?\""},{"lineNumber":149622,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それは……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That is...\""},{"lineNumber":149623,"originalJapaneseLine":"「大量の女だ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"A large number of women!\""},{"lineNumber":149624,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":149625,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……はあ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Huh?\""},{"lineNumber":149626,"originalJapaneseLine":"「む、なんだその顔は」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh, what's with that face?\""},{"lineNumber":149627,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いや、なにをする気か、とな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, I mean, what are you planning to do...?\""},{"lineNumber":149628,"originalJapaneseLine":"「言っとくが、抱かせろとか言うつもりなら」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Let me tell you, if you're thinking of saying 'let me sleep with them'—\""},{"lineNumber":149629,"originalJapaneseLine":"「アホ、そんなことするか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Idiot, do you think I'd do something like that?\""},{"lineNumber":149630,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、いや、しかしそれも……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, no, but still...\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シーラの目尻にじわりと涙が浮かぶ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tears welled up at the corner of Sheila's eyes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いつもヒューバートさんにはとても感謝を……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I am always very grateful to Hubert-san..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺様のものに馴れ馴れしく触るな」
「シィル、シーラ、お前らはここ」
ランスは普段、大統領が腰を下ろす席に座ると、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When Rance sat down in the seat where the president usually sits,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 膝の上にシィルとシーラの二人を座らせた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he made Sil and Sheila sit on his lap.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よし、まあこんなもんだろう」
「ったく、すっかり元に戻りやがって。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Geez, you've completely gone back to normal.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちったぁ凹んでる方がマシだったかもな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe it was better when you were a bit down."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いーえ、なにも言っておりませんで。
「よく分からんがニヤつくな、気持ち悪い」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I don't really get it, but stop smirking, it's creepy."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「シーラ様の帰還で喜ばれるのはいいですが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's good that you're happy with Sheila-sama's return, but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうですな、未だ魔人を倒す術はなく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's true. We still have no way to defeat the Demon God,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ばーかーどーもーめー！」
お前まさか何か考えが？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Are you possibly thinking of something?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「前から臭いとは思っていたが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I suspected it for a while... but now that the two have returned,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二人が帰ってきたので確信が持てた」
「がははははははははははは！
もう俺様の勝ちは決まったようなものだ！」
「が、その為には必要なものがある！」
「おお、何か必要ならヘルマンがいくらでも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, if you need anything, Hellman will cooperate as much as you want!"
"No, I mean, what are you planning to do...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「言っとくが、抱かせろとか言うつもりなら」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Let me tell you, if you're thinking of saying 'let me sleep with them'—"
"Idiot, do you think I'd do something like that?"

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I am always very grateful to Hubert-san..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 膝の上にシィルとシーラの二人を座らせた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he made Sil and Sheila sit on his lap.

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Geez, you've completely gone back to normal.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いーえ、なにも言っておりませんで。

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I don't really get it, but stop smirking, it's creepy."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「シーラ様の帰還で喜ばれるのはいいですが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's good that you're happy with Sheila-sama's return, but..."

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's true. We still have no way to defeat the Demon God,

お前まさか何か考えが？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Are you possibly thinking of something?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「前から臭いとは思っていたが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I suspected it for a while... but now that the two have returned,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二人が帰ってきたので確信が持てた」

もう俺様の勝ちは決まったようなものだ！」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, if you need anything, Hellman will cooperate as much as you want!"
"No, I mean, what are you planning to do...?"

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Let me tell you, if you're thinking of saying 'let me sleep with them'—"
